special_powers.name: LEGEND OF THE PAST
special_powers.description: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Sersi this turn.

special_powers.name: ENSNARE
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose an opposing character within range and line of fire. Until your next turn, whenever that character is adjacent to blocking terrain within Sersi's range it gains Immobile.

special_powers.name: A MORE SUITABLE FORM FOR YOU
special_powers.description: Perplex, but only to target opposing characters. When she uses it, the target can use Earthbound/Neutralized until your next turn.

special_powers.description: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Ikaris this turn.

special_powers.name: BURGEONING COSMIC MASTERY
special_powers.description: FREE: Once per game, remove all of Ikaris's action tokens and he has PROTECTED: Outwit until your next turn.

special_powers.name: THE JOY OF FLIGHT!
special_powers.description: Charge, but do not halve speed.

special_powers.name: LEGEND OF THE PAST
special_powers.description: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Ajak this turn.

special_powers.name: WE MUST PROTECT THEM
special_powers.description: Defend, Invulnerability, Willpower. Friendly characters with the Eternal keyword can use Mastermind, but only to choose Ajak.

special_powers.description: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Thena this turn.

special_powers.description: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Makkari this turn.

special_powers.name: THE FASTEST ETERNAL
special_powers.description: Charge, Flurry, Sidestep. When Makkari hits, immediately after the attack resolves, you may move up to 3 squares (after each attack when using Flurry).

special_powers.name: LEGEND OF THE PAST
special_powers.description: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Druig this turn.

special_powers.name: INFLUENCE
special_powers.description: Mind Control. When Druig uses it, after resolutions choose one to last until your next turn: all hit characters gain Immobile; -or- all hit characters can't attack.

special_powers.name: IGNITE
special_powers.description: POWER: Make a range attack. Instead of normal damage, deal 1 penetrating damage to each hit character and all other characters within 3 squares of one or more hit characters.

special_powers.name: LEGEND OF THE PAST
special_powers.description: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Gilgamesh this turn.

special_powers.name: THE STRENGTH TO TAME ENKIDU
special_powers.description: Super Strength. // When Gilgamesh is attacked while holding an object, Gilgamesh modifies defense +2. If that attack misses, after resolutions KO the held object.

special_powers.name: LEGEND OF THE PAST
special_powers.description: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Kingo this turn.

special_powers.name: THE DISCIPLINE OF THE BLADE
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs. FREE: Roll a d6 and place it on Kingo's card, replacing any there. // When Kingo rolls for a close attack or Blades/Claws/Fangs, you may remove the die from this card to replace a die in that roll.

special_powers.name: LEGEND OF THE PAST
special_powers.description: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Phastos this turn.

special_powers.name: MASTER OF THE FORGE
special_powers.description: Super Strength. FREE: KO an object that a friendly character is holding. If you do, choose one: Close Combat Expert, Invulnerability, or Ranged Combat Expert. That character can use the chosen power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: AN ARMORY HONED BY MATHEMATICAL PRECISION
special_powers.description: UNIQUE MODIFIER: Other friendly characters with the Eternal keyword within 4 squares modify damage +1. // POWER: Generate an object (light or heavy).

special_powers.description: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Sprite this turn.

special_powers.name: JUST A CHILD
special_powers.description: Shape Change. When Sprite uses it, if there is another friendly character within the attacker's range and line of fire, increase her Shape Change roll +1.

special_powers.name: COCKEREL CROW
special_powers.description: Probability Control. Once per turn for all characters with this effect, when she uses Probability Control during an opponent's turn, modify the target character's damage -1 this turn.

special_powers.name: THE INSPIRATION FOR THE LEGENDS
special_powers.description: Stealth. FREE: Place Werewolf Deviant in a square of hindering terrain within 4 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: DEVOUR THE HUMAN CATTLE
special_powers.description: Steal Energy. When Werewolf Deviant KO's an opposing character with an attack, after resolutions, heal Werewolf Deviant equal to the damage it dealt.

special_powers.name: SHEEP'S CLOTHING
special_powers.description: Shape Change, but succeeds on 4-6.

special_powers.name: GODS HIDDEN AMONG MORTALS
special_powers.description: Until Sersi makes an attack, takes damage, or is the last character on your force, she can't be targeted by non-adjacent opposing characters.

special_powers.name: BENEFICIAL TRANSFORMATION
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose a standard friendly character within range and line of fire, then choose: Giant symbol, Tiny symbol, Wing symbol, or a copyable team ability a character on the map can use. The chosen character can use the chosen effect until your next turn.

special_powers.name: OKAY, FINE, THE BAD GUY IS A TREE
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Sersi uses it, after resolutions you may generate up to 2 blocking terrain markers adjacent to a hit target given an action token. At the beginning of your next turn, remove those markers even if this power is lost.

special_powers.description: FREE: Once per game, if Ikaris was damaged by an attack since your last turn, heal 2 clicks and when he attacks this turn, his target(s) can't use defense powers.

special_powers.description: Colossal Stamina. // When Ikaris hits, after resolutions choose one: remove an action token from him -or- heal 1 click.

special_powers.description: Until Gilgamesh makes an attack, takes damage, or is the last character on your force, he can't be targeted by non-adjacent opposing characters.

special_powers.description: Close Combat Expert, Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.description: Quake. When he uses it, after resolutions choose one: give an action token to all hit targets -or- all hit targets can use Earthbound/Neutralized until your next turn.

special_powers.name: BUSHIDO WITH BOLLYWOOD STYLE
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Precision Strike. Modify Kingo's defense +1 for each action token he has.

special_powers.description: Hypersonic Speed. When Kingo uses it, you may roll a d6. If you do, during Hypersonic Speed instead of one attack, he makes a number of close attacks equal to half the result using his printed combat values.

special_powers.description: Until Phastos makes an attack, takes damage, or is the last character on your force, he can't be targeted by non-adjacent opposing characters.

special_powers.name: THE RIGHT TOOLS FOR THE JOB
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, you may choose a Marvel team ability that isn't uncopyable. Friendly characters with the Eternal keyword can use the chosen team ability this game.

special_powers.description: Outwit, Perplex. When Phastos uses Perplex to target a friendly character with the Eternal keyword, after resolutions modify all adjacent friendly characters attack +1 this turn.

special_powers.description: Sprite's combat values can't be replaced or positively modified. // POWER: Give Sprite a Youth token, then turn her to click #X, where X is her number of Youth tokens.

special_powers.description: Toughness. // POWER: Roll a d6 and heal Kro equal to the result.

special_powers.name: ...COALESCED INTO PURE FORM
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, choose one to use this turn: Close Combat Expert, Range Combat Expert, or Colossal Stamina. // At the beginning of your turn, if Uni-Mind has 2 action tokens, choose one that you didn't choose on your last turn to use this turn: Phasing/Teleport as FREE or Regeneration as FREE.
